resources.string: myLock Auto Unlock
myLock is enabled
myLock is disabled
Require lockscreen on keypad slider open wakeup
Auto unlock on keypad slider open wakeup
Auto unlock will always occur
Auto unlock only on slider open wakeup
Ongoing status notification will run
Ongoing status notification is disabled
ENABLED- The set pattern will be disabled while myLock is active
DISABLED- Set up a security pattern from system prefs
Advanced mode - volume and camera (and trackball on the nexus one) will wake and unlock.
Auto unlock - lockscreen visible during unlock, side keys locked
Hide lockscreen - wallpaper shown instead, side keys locked
Advanced mode - removes lockscreen, side keys wake and unlock
How to use myLock

myLock automatically minimizes the lockscreen. Side buttons remain locked down, but waking the phone with the slider, keypad buttons, or power key will auto unlock. If the phone reboots while myLock is running, it will start back up automatically with your preferred settings. Do not attempt to change the security pattern or create one while myLock is enabled. Always uncheck enabled first.
Problem Help

Please see our faq and troubleshooting pages linked on our site (http://mylockandroid.blogspot.com) first. If you notice an issue that happens consistently, download Log Collector (free from the market) to email us at myLockandroid@gmail.com. Be sure to list the problem symptoms and what other services are running in the Settings->Applications->Running Services screen. I will research the cause of the trouble and code a fix when possible.
